properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_HOTEL VALUES( SEQ_HOTEL.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, ? )
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO) AS CNTS FROM TB_ROOM JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y'

SELECT HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, COUNT(TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) FROM TB_HOTEL LEFT JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO GROUP BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH HAVING COUNT(TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) < 3) ORDER BY HOTEL_NO DESC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) AS ROOM_PRICE FROM TB_HOTEL JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH ORDER BY ROOM_PRICE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_INTRO FROM TB_HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT TB_SERVICE.SERVICE_NO, SERVICE_NAME FROM TB_HOTEL JOIN TB_SERVICE ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_SERVICE.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_SERVICE_LIST ON TB_SERVICE_LIST.SERVICE_NO = TB_SERVICE.SERVICE_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT TB_ROOM.CHECKIN_TIME, TB_ROOM.CHECKOUT_TIME, ROOM_NUM, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_IMG, ROOM_NAME FROM TB_ROOM JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_ROOM_IMG ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM_IMG.ROOM_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO, RESER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_REVIEW ON TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO = TB_REVIEW.RV_RESER_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND CANCEl_YN = 'N' AND REVIEW_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON TB_REVIEW.RV_RESER_NO = TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?
